name: SleepNote
description:
Control a little robot shooting down alien spacecrafts!

SleepNote is a Prototype, a 2d game demo that i've made in Unity  5 back in 2016. This was the third and last Unity project i've ever worked on  (since Unity 3) and the 5th game project chronologically in my portfolio.

The story was about the context of a Notebook sitting on a table in a base at "Σελήνη" - Moon. 

Controls: ⬅️A + D➡️ + crouch with CTRL + jump with SPACEBAR + aim with MOUSE + shoot with LEFT CLICK.

▪️
